ygData.messageBody:
Repeat it, as I'm in the same boat. Don't remember stats, never saw the
quest spoiled.

-----Original Message-----
From: Jenni [mailto:freya@...]
Sent: Wednesday, March 01, 2000 11:55 AM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Happy Love Bracers spoiler


From: Jenni <freya@...>

I've cleaned out my e-mail box a bit and have lost the going thread about
these bracers. What are the stats on the bracers? Who can wear them?

I've overheard the conversation many times, but could never seem to get a
solid quest out of it. Has anyone done the quest? If so, for the sake of
not
repeating information on the list, can someone e-mail me the details?

Thanks!
Ezrae 18th lvl DE Enchantress
Brell Serilis
